website_summaries.verdict: Roomy design made for those with long hair, braids, or dreadlocks. Popular for those with curly or thick hair as well.
pros: Lightweight and durable silicone cap in a tear-resistant design
Comes with a bonus nose clip
Extra room at the crown and sides
Available in sizes S to XL, so it offers a better fit than universal cap styles
cons: Cap goes over ears but won’t keep water out of them completely
Some trial and error to find the best fit

customer_reviews.title: Hair is soaked when I take it off
customer_reviews.text: 2nd time wearing this. Both times the ear flaps roll up. I have a hard time hearing people through the flaps too. And both times my hair has been soaked when I take it off. I have thin hair too. The fit is snug, not loose at all so not sure how my hair is still getting wet unless it's from the ear flaps. Not what I was expecting at all. **update** gave this cap a few more chances, and I still hate it. And tried out the complimentary nose plug, it rolls right off my nose, doesn't even stay on. Both are junk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps hair dry
customer_reviews.text: It keeps my hair mostly dry. Better than other swim caps I’ve used. This is an issue for me since I dye my hair and don’t want chlorine to change my hair color or further damage my hair. It works best when I pull my hair into a high (top of head) ponytail. Only gets wet at nape of neck and sometimes a little by the ears.
customer_reviews.author: GramJo

customer_reviews.title: My hair is all wet
customer_reviews.text: The swim cap that I received is not keeping my hair dry. As a matter of fact when I finish a lap in the pool, my hair is totally wet.
customer_reviews.author: NB Balance

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you put the logo in the front!
customer_reviews.text: Once I got the hang of how to put on the cap everything was great. I realized I was putting it on backwards (maybe it's just me!) and my hair was getting a little wet. Once I figured out the logo goes in front, I was able to put it on and use it without frustration. I will say, putting it on it takes a bit getting used to, but now I can do it quickly and efficiently.
customer_reviews.author: Karen W. Miller

customer_reviews.title: doesn't stretch enough
customer_reviews.text: i don't know if i have an extra big head lol but i can't get this on my head and my husband tried pulling it open also and we just couldn't do it. i'm so surprised cause it said for long hair and i had it in a bun at the top of my head. disappointed of course, i should have ordered the other one which i will do now.
customer_reviews.author: LFD

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP AND BROKE BEFORE FIRST TIME TRYING IT ON.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely cheap and not worth it. Opened the package and even after reading directions I tried to put it on and it ripped right down the middle. Wasted money on a product that broke before even using it once. Dont buy it, and save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Katarina Zakrzewski

customer_reviews.title: Ripped after two uses!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product in advance of my swim lessons. I have thick natural hair in general and box braids during my lessons so I wanted a cap that would cover/protect all of my hair. The cap was difficult to put on and didn’t fit at all. It barely pulled down to my ears and water rushed up the back as soon as I put my head underwater. 10 minutes into my second swim class a small piece ripped when I tried to pull in down then it completely fell apart. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Williams

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy
customer_reviews.text: Wore this only 3 times and it already ripped. It has enough room for long hair but it doesn’t really stay put. I kept having to pull it down. I guess with all the adjusting, it just couldn’t withstand and ripped a huge piece off. Wouldn’t recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Chan

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, I can now enjoy daily pool dates with my son.
customer_reviews.text: Great Product, I can now enjoy daily pool dates with my son. I have long blonde hair that gets damaged by the pool water not to mention is a burden to wash after every daily pool date with my son. The only thing that gets getting used to is that this swim cap covers yours ears. Great for swimmers and preventing swimmer's ear but hard to listen/ hear my son. Overall awesome time saving product. Thank you. It has held up to the Arizona 110F weather since I sometimes forget and keep it outside.
customer_reviews.author: Alisa

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: The swim cap fits well cover all the hair. But water goes inside. It’s like not wear a swim cap because the hair is drenched in water. Not good quality
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: The cap is good however I have been having problems with finding the fifth hairstyle under it. It came out maybe two or three times while I was training. It covers your ears pretty Good. Ah! They send you a note in the package claiming that you need to complete a survey for a free drybag, but when it is time to claim It, they show you the instructions for 3 seconds and then redirect you to another page.
customer_reviews.author: Susana

customer_reviews.title: FINALLY - A SWIMMING CAP THAT STAYS ON AND FITS
customer_reviews.text: I HAVE ONLY USED MY SWIMMING CAP ONCE BUT I WISH I’D BOUGHT IT A YEAR AGO. IT FIT AND STAYED PUT. IT DIDN’T EVEN BUDGE. IT IS WELL WORTH THE PRICE. I HAVE LONG HAIR AND SOMETIMES HAVE HAD TO USE A CAP WITH A CHIN STRAP TO KEEP IT ON. NOT WITH THIS SWIMMING CAP. IT’S A GAME CHANGER.
customer_reviews.author: Vance R. Hiner

customer_reviews.title: Not for competitive swimming
customer_reviews.text: Definitely did not keep my hair even somewhat dry like advertised, it was actually soaked. I have long, thick, hair and was really hoping it would. Additionally, the front consistently slides up your forehead to the point where you actually have to pause your lap to pull it back down. Super irritating to not be able to swim 25 meters without having to stop. And don’t even think about doing a flip turn without almost losing it off your head.
customer_reviews.author: Jennica

customer_reviews.title: First time disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I've bought many of these caps in the last few years and they hold up well - I like the ear coverage. This time, however, the first time I went to put it on it ripped apart. I've been swimming for over 10 years and am aware of the proper way to put the caps on so it wasn't user error. I'm hoping it was a fluke. Also, I found it a little obnoxious that I have to go out of my way to drop the ripped one at a UPS store vs them just sending the new one. I know.. entitled sounding.. but it's definitely an out of the way trip.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith Dombroski

customer_reviews.title: Keeping my hair dry.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cap not realizing It's the same as one I already have, the description when I ordered was confusing. Actually the cap is to big & does leak. I had thought this one was smaller, it said for lots of hair, where the first one I had bought said for dread locks. All the caps I have tried are either to small or to big, I do have long hair no dread locks, haven't found one that doesn't leak. Also this cap is so big after I swim & it leaks it begins to slide down on my forehead. I have blonde hair & don't want the chlorine in my hair. Help!
customer_reviews.author: brookieann

customer_reviews.title: Keeps hair dry
customer_reviews.text: The first one ripped the 2nd time I used it, but the Seller quickly replaced. So I'm more careful when putting it on. As for comfort, I haven't found ANY swimcap to be comfortable! I have very long hair and swim regularly. I don't want to expose my hair to that much chlorine, so I tried several types of swimcaps; this was the only one that works reasonably well. My hairline does get a little wet, but most of my hair stays dry. I also like the ear shape because it adds a tiny bit of comfort -- and helping keep my hair dry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 4 stars cuz it still leaked water but kept it out for the most part
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive scalp and have been losing hair so I'm hyper sensitive to chlorine. This does help to keep most of it out but my scalp still came out red after a swim which means it had chlorine exposure(i wet it before i went into the pool and everything but still..) Anyways, I'd say its one of the better ones. Doesn't snag hair and comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Chang

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and works for my long curly hair
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy the product. It is easy to put on and I had no issues getting my long, thick, middle eastern, curly hair into it. My only concern is after five uses, the ear part of the cap started to rise up. This allows a bit of water to get into my hair and ears. It also makes me have to open the cap to get the water out of my ears for each lap. I'm a new swimmer and this is my first cap so it could be a me thing. I'm just happy that I'm able to get my hair type into it and it keeps my hair 95% dry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kinda sucks :-(
customer_reviews.text: I hate to leave a bad review but my ears were clogged and my hair absolutely soaked. The only good it did was keep my hair out of the way.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Keep Hair Dry
customer_reviews.text: Frustrating. What is the point of a swim cap if it doesn't keep your hair dry? I have a smaller head and shoulder length hair and this thing constantly lets water in the back and the ear flops always come up while swimming. I do the top knot and everything that is recommended, but it always lets water in. Very disappointed. Updating this review. Been trying it out more and it really doesn't do a good job. Let's in a ton of water when swimming freestyle laps.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't keep my hair dry
customer_reviews.text: The material looks fine and the color is beautiful but it doesn't keep my hear dry. I think the water goes into the cap through the ears. Maybe its better without this feature. My third time using it and eventhough I did pull it as much as I could, half of my hair is wet. The thing for the nose didn't work eather it doesn't stay in the nose, I just don't use it.. I wish I had pay attention to the other comments...
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: BEST SWIM CAP
customer_reviews.text: I like the way this cap fits, especially around the ears. Also the shape is pretty nice looking for a swim cap. This cap seems to be keeping my medium length hair from being destroyed by chlorine.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Nothing Special
customer_reviews.text: This didn’t keep my hair dry at all. In fact, the edges lifted up as soon as I put my head under water. The ear covers are a joke too. Also, if you have nails beware...at least I’m giving it the benefit of the doubt and claiming my nails. There is absolutely no play in this material and a sliver popped off the second time I wore it. My daughter’s $1.99 caps that I buy in bulk work better.
customer_reviews.author: TanHamp

customer_reviews.title: Get It!
customer_reviews.text: This cap is the bomb! It was my first time using this kind so I didn't know what to expect. I had my hair pin curled and wrapped saran wrap around my head before putting the swim cap on. It was a comfortable fit and I was able to wear it for a while. When I took it off, my hair was just like it was before putting it on. No ounce of water. In the past, recent caps were a fail but this one is a must buy!
customer_reviews.author: D HARRISON

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, Affordable, Durable Cap for Long Hair
customer_reviews.text: I have used the swim elite caps for a few years. They are comfortable for me and don't give me a headache as some other caps do. My hair is long, about halfway down my back, and this cap contains it all without causing tension on the front of the cap. It's basic and not fancy, but it really works well. I have no problem putting it on or having it cause hairpulling when I take it off.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Love having a quality product--that endures its use so beautifully.
customer_reviews.text: I do a lot of physical therapy---now in the water---and love having the swim cap from your company that keeps my long hair dry during my PT sessions! I look forward to ordering more of your products---and enjoying additional colors of swim caps!
customer_reviews.author: DutchDivaMom

customer_reviews.title: didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: I have longggggg hair and I just couldn't manage it all into this cap no matter what I tried. The opening was just too small for both my head and my hair (even after I french braided my hair and pinned it to my head.). Might work well for you though.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Consumer

customer_reviews.title: A cap that stays on your head
customer_reviews.text: Just used this for the first time to swim laps and I am happy. I didn't have to stop to tug it down. It stayed put on my head and kept my hair way drier than other latex caps i have used before. It's a keeper
customer_reviews.author: Barrie

customer_reviews.title: Good cap for the money
customer_reviews.text: I have had a variety of swim caps over the years and this one ranks in top. It's definitely budget freindly. It's not as tight fitting as my others so it's a bit easier to put on. I have long, thick hair so you would be hard pressed to find a cap that keeps your hair 100% dry. With that said, my hair does get a bit wet around the edges, but I can live with that, as the majority of my hair is kept dry. I'm not a big fan of that ear covering feature as it distorts sounds for me, but it's not a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: Krissy Johnetty

customer_reviews.title: Did Not Work
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I don't know what it was but this swim cap was not for me. I have about shoulder length hair, a little thick since I have curly hair so this cap seemed to fit a little big on me from the top which didn't seem like a big deal. It did not do a good job of keeping any water out. The cap kept folding and the water would remain stuck inside of the cap. I ended up having to return this cap. I see that some people really enjoyed it and I wish I did, but it did not work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and comfort but hairline will be wet
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use as a shower cap for my long, very thick hair. It did the job but my hairline still got wet even after making sure all wicking strands, earlobes and earrings were safely tucked away under the cap. I suspect it will leak if you use it in a pool work out setting. It will keep your hair comfortably tucked away, and it is comfortable to wear. Mine tore after 6 months of almost daily use showering. I was happy enough to buy two more--assuming one will tear at some point.
customer_reviews.author: handdoc

customer_reviews.title: Terrible! Medium length hair is soaking wet after 5 laps
customer_reviews.text: Soaking wet! From my first lap I could feel water getting in. This picture is from five laps and my hair is soaked. I purchased this to keep chlorine out of my colored hair and out of the pool but low and behold red tinted water is pouring everywhere. Total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Appreciate
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: I still used this cap, but it doesn't keep my hair dry. 😒 Daily swimming indoors, I finally accepted that I need a bathing cap. This one fit the bill, or head and hair (shoulder length). I just received this cap and tried it on. Appreciate the instructions as I would have put in from the forehead first. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Roberta on Cape

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR LONG HAIR
customer_reviews.text: I like the color of this cap but... DEFINITELY NOT FOR LONG HAIR! I have long curly hair and bought this to protect my curls from the chlorine while swimming. After the first time using it, a chunk tore off while I adjusted it. I figured it would be fine but the underside of my hair got completely soaked while wearing it. Even without the chunk that tore off, it is too tight. Maybe it would work for someone with much shorter hair?!
customer_reviews.author: mc

customer_reviews.title: Great swim cap
customer_reviews.text: Go-to swim cap for long hair. It keeps my hair dry. It fits nice. A lot of times w Swim caps are so tight they are hard to get on and they end up giving me a headache. This one is comfortable and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Patti

customer_reviews.title: Something that actually fits and stays on!!
customer_reviews.text: FINALLY!!! Something that works and keeps my daughter’s hair dry. She is 6 yrs old and has long hair. Everything else was not big enough and kept coming off and getting her hair wet. This is the 3rd one we’ve tried and are extremely pleased. There is extra room on the top but that leaves room for her to grow into. It’s nice and snug around her face.
customer_reviews.author: Carlene S.

customer_reviews.title: Well made and great for long hair
customer_reviews.text: Love this swim cap. I have long hair and have no problems getting it on or off. Love that it also covers the ears. The cap seems to be well made and thick. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Bizzymammabee

customer_reviews.title: Keeps hair dry
customer_reviews.text: I’m on my third cap from amazon. I highlight my hair and getting it wet is not an option. This cap is easy to put on and keeps my hair dryer than the others. It still gets a little wet, but better than the others.
customer_reviews.author: Louie

customer_reviews.title: Good coverage, but not leak-proof
customer_reviews.text: I have waist-length hair and try to avoid getting it wet when swimming. I have never found a swimming cap that keeps my hair completely dry, and this one doesn't either. The cap rides up a couple of inches, so the hair at the nape of my neck gets wet. The material quality is durable, and I really liked the red color. I do have to pull it down every few minutes, though.
customer_reviews.author: rita tehan

customer_reviews.title: Well made n fitted though could be roomier.
customer_reviews.text: This swim cap is good for long hair but I also have very thick hair, so I feel I need a little more room for my hair. The back hair still get quite wet because of the that reason. Overall I think it’s well made and fitted.
customer_reviews.author: SJS

customer_reviews.title: Good fit, ear flaps ride up a bit
customer_reviews.text: I really like the sturdiness of the material, it also has stretch. I have an average female head and the small fits well and I am able to stuff my long hair into the cap. Yes the ear flaps do come up a bit while swimming but not excessively. I find that after a couple laps I have to stop and pull all the edges down. My hair stays 90% dry with this cap, most of the wetness is at the back of my neck.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Not for waist length hair!
customer_reviews.text: Although I never used the product for swimming, the material and durability of the product were great in my opinion. My problem with this product was it claims it is for long hair and looks as if it has extra room for hair in its advertised picture, this was not the case, at least with the product I received. I have waist length long hair and my hair barely fit into the cap. It was very tight and felt as if a knot was being pushed into my head, which it was because there was no room for my hair. Therefore I didn’t keep it, I returned it and am currently waiting for another cap to try.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable and helps protect ears
customer_reviews.text: I have short hair but need a cap with good ear coverage. This cap is durable and does a better job of helping to keep my ears dry. I use a waterproof iPod when I swim and the ear pockets help make the earphones more comfortable. If I don't use the iPod when doing laps, I would still need ear plugs.
customer_reviews.author: A. Fetter

customer_reviews.title: Came with a hole in it
customer_reviews.text: Can’t really write a review because the one I purchased came with a hole in it. Which wasn’t good considering it was brought to be used for aqua therapy, so it was definitely needed
customer_reviews.author: Rendezvous

customer_reviews.title: Long Hair Protection from Chlorine
customer_reviews.text: I need to swim four times a week for physical therapy but the chlorine in the pool was destroying my hair. Someone suggested I wear a swim cap and this one was perfect because I have really long hair that I needed to be able to tuck it all inside. It stays in place while in the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Sea Gal

customer_reviews.title: Coverage is excellent for long hair
customer_reviews.text: I swim several times a week and found this cap easy to put on and appears very durable. THe only challenge was getting use to keeping the ear shapes in the right position.
customer_reviews.author: richard healy

customer_reviews.title: Good swim cap, keep hair mostly dry, need some getting used to
customer_reviews.text: The product was purchased for my teenage daughter who hasn't worn a swim cap before. She said the cap creates an air pocket on top of her head. And when you push to get rid of the air pocket, she feels pressure to her ears, which she said was a little weird. Her hair got just a little wet around the edge of the cap. She'll continue to use it as she likes the vibrant blue color. Hopefully she'll get used to wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: Harpseal

customer_reviews.title: Nice Swim Cap AND FREE Nose Plugs - Win, Win!
customer_reviews.text: I like that it is black in color and that it easily covers all of my thick, long hair, and ears. There is extra space given for ears and for hair in back of head. I haven't used it yet in water, but it seems durable with being made from a silicone material. I'm looking forward to using this for many years to come!
customer_reviews.author: G. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Great for long hair
customer_reviews.text: Bathing cap is perfect for long hair. I’m able to fit my long locks under the cap and still have enough room to cover my ears
customer_reviews.author: picky consumer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised that when we received this swim cap that it was ripped by the ear and there was hair inside the cap as if it were already worn.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas C.

customer_reviews.title: Dive in with this cap, the water's fine
customer_reviews.text: I have a big head and long hair, and finding a swim cap that a) fits my head, b) accommodates my hair, and c) is easy to put on without yanking out my hair, has been a struggle. This cap performs flawlessly on all three points. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: karenn

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with a rip and is covered in powder.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. The swim cap arrived with a TEAR in the front and it is also dirty - covered in powder and some pink glitter so it must have been worn by someone before. Also the cardboard it came with has oil or lotion stains on it for some reason.
customer_reviews.author: miss

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cap!  Recommended
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I bought this cap because I really liked it but after a several uses It broke, maybe I stretched it too much but it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delivers as promised, quality good.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first swim cap and I am happy with it. It works well although some water does get through the cap when I am swimming. I read in past reviews some people complained about the cap tearing when they put it on -(like when you have long finger nails or rings on) so the pamphlet telling you how to properly put it on/off was helpful. I've used several times swimming and have had no issues with tearing.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Slightly pulls up
customer_reviews.text: Overall the cap stretched and made it over the ears and hair was tucked in. The downside was that the cap raised up some in the water. It could because my daughter used goggles and it possibly pulled but the size overall is great.
customer_reviews.author: ShayStar119

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I knew about this cap years ago so I didn’t suffer so much with all the tight, small caps for years! I have big head (helmets don’t fit) and long hair that I had to keep cutting to fit into a speedo cap.
customer_reviews.author: Orcafuzz

customer_reviews.title: Not for thick hair
customer_reviews.text: This cap is difficult to get on, does not stay over ears wants to pop up. Guess I have too much hair for this particular style cap and it is tight around the head, but does not keep water out. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Rena

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly effective
customer_reviews.text: elated I can swim laps every day and not expose my long hair to the drying chemicals in the pool water. This swim cap has a nice, water tight seal around the hairline, and enough room for a long hair bun. Completely satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Libby Bertsch

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this swim cap 2 stars due to the ease of putting it on even with arthritic hands. But other than that, I am not happy with this purchase. I put my shoulder length hair in a bun on the top of my head and it still gets wet. And even though this cap covers my ears, they still get water in them.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Second Purchase
customer_reviews.text: My hair was about halfway down my back and THICK. The cap ripped after about 6 months or so of light use (use got more frequent as time went on). However, this did the best job of holding all my hair, keeping it kind of dry, and staying on my head. This is my second purchase, and I’m hoping it’s perfect this time, after a haircut!!
customer_reviews.author: Lara

customer_reviews.title: Works so far
customer_reviews.text: I use this for water aerobics and sometime laps in the indoor pool. When used with a headband it keeps my hair quite dry if I'm not constantly under water. I'm satisfied with mostly dry hair.
customer_reviews.author: JaBul

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the swim cap to protect hair coloring while swimming. Works well, but like any swim cap it does pull the hair a bit while applying/removing. Material is good quality and substantial. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Rado72

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the money for a recreational swimmer
customer_reviews.text: I swim approximately 3x per week and this cap is great for those of us with medium to long hair. I'm very pleased with the material, fit, and overall comfort. My only improvement is sometimes the cap wants to flop over a tiny bit right below the ears but honestly with a little adjustment it's absolutely fine.
customer_reviews.author: Sara D Cales

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put on
customer_reviews.text: This swim cap is super easy to put on and take off. It doesn't pull my hair. I like that it covers my ears because I really don't have to worry about water getting in. I still use earplugs, but feel really secure with the cap.
customer_reviews.author: KTech

customer_reviews.title: Good quality cap with bonus nose quard
customer_reviews.text: Needed something to keep my hair up out of the way in the water. Does the job. Yes your hair will get wet. Every bathing cap let's some water in. But this is a nice and comfortable cap.
customer_reviews.author: C Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Hurts ears
customer_reviews.text: My ears hurt underwater with this cap on.. never had that feeling before. And my hair still gets wet starting at base of neck. Bummer bc it’s thick material n seems like good quality.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Very nicely designed swim cap.
customer_reviews.text: I received the cap yesterday and could immediately see it was too large for me. I should have ordered a cap for short hair since my "long" hair is thin and I have a small head. I will return it, but try one in for short hair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very roomy for long hair
customer_reviews.text: The size of this swim cap is great. I felt it provided more than enough room for my hair length, which is actually medium length. I did find it a little difficult to pull onto dry hair, which is my whole purpose of buying the cap, keeping my hair dry. I think I found the solution by stretching it using the forehead and pulling back.
customer_reviews.author: sylvia

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t keep hair dry at all.
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded my swimming cap in the hopes that this one would keep my hair dry. It did not. I was very careful to put it on correctly but it leaked and all of my hair got wet.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Holla

customer_reviews.title: 1st test later today!
customer_reviews.text: I just received my swim cap. It fits and seems like it will be more than adequate. I will be using it for the first time later today. I will update my review after I return.
customer_reviews.author: mom of 3

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter with long and thick hair. She had her hair colored and didn’t want to get it in the chlorine in the pool. Works very well!! I was surprised at how stretchy it was and able to cover all her hair.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Colour same as photo, good amount of stretch to be able to physically get it on yet tight enough that it is very secure. I swim in open water every day, and when I manage to put it on correctly it makes a huge difference to the overall fit and thus waterproofing element. It’s a nice thickness too, so I don’t worry about accidentally putting my nails through it when wrangling it over my below shoulder length hair and large noggin!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My hair still gets wet somehow
customer_reviews.text: EVERYTIME I swim with this new cap, my hair is very wet! I pay too much at the beauty salon to chance my hair turning dull or stripping the color! I DO NOT RECOMMEND!!!
customer_reviews.author: Janine Long

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t keep hair from getting wet
customer_reviews.text: Worked first day in pool after that my hair was soaked the next day I put the swim cap on and I did everything the same wrapped my hair up it was a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Karm

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Nice, flexible material. It is easy to put on and take off. My hair does NOT get stuck in/on it. I like that it covers your ears. I get a big air bubble at the top of my head while swimming laps. I wear this to keep my hair from getting in my face while swimming. No headaches!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Delby

customer_reviews.title: Great swim cap, works well for long or thick bushy hair!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality swim cap, the only one that works for my thick, bushy hair, the space made for the ears too is great. Keeps my hair dry without feeling tight, stays in place. Am very happy and would recommend the product. The nose clip is a bonus :)
customer_reviews.author: Priya

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t snag hair.  Comfortable fit.
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old daughter with long hair keeps her hair mostly dry. Her ears stay dry. It is easy to put on with no tears. First one lasted one swim season. She’s on swim team so she swims five or six days a week.
customer_reviews.author: Sullian

customer_reviews.title: Great Swim Cap
customer_reviews.text: I really like this swim cap although I have never had one before so I don't have much to compare it to. I will say that although the cap covers my ears, water does get into my ear and because of the flap the water is not able to exit easily. It seems water gets trapped in my ear while swimming. It doesn't bother me enough to not use it though. I still really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Verda Ryan

customer_reviews.title: The best it's going to get
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 swimcaps for long hair from 2 different companies and believe that this design may be the better of the two--the cap fully covers my head/hair and the ear covers are helpful. Essentially, your hair won't stay 100% dry, but the material does a good job at preventing water from being absorbed into the cap. If you swim with any force and swim underwater, some water is bound to seep in.
customer_reviews.author: Dolly S.

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: purchased this item in June 2020 and it did not last until August 2020. The cap ripped within less than 3 month's. Used this in my pool at home at least 10 times and the cap ripped in front of your head. Poorly designed and not durable. Very disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: sweetguyreally

customer_reviews.title: First time swim cap user.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first experience using a swim cap. I think the first time I tried it on backwards. Lol I finally figured out how to wear it correctly, but still had issues with leakage around the hair line in back. It also tends to roll up around my ears. Otherwise it does seem to protect a majority of my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Beth H

customer_reviews.title: Cap does not stay on head after swimming a few feet
customer_reviews.text: The cap keeps popping off while swimming. I am going to need to get a different cap. I do have a pony tail I am putting in the cap.no matter what I do the cap comes off while swimmung
customer_reviews.author: Carol L. G

customer_reviews.title: Solid.
customer_reviews.text: Sufficient for swimming laps. Stays on. My hair does get wet when swimming laps but I've never found a cap where my hair stays dry. This one totally does the job and covers my ears nicely.
customer_reviews.author: courtney waldrop

customer_reviews.title: Roomy for long hair great for keeping out water.
customer_reviews.text: Hard to put on because the material sticks to skin. Very good at keeping out water & holding in hair. I just got it so can’t write about durability.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well. My favorite of all I’ve tried.
customer_reviews.text: Love this swim cap. I have tried my share of them and this one is actually comfortable and keeps my long hair dryer than any of the others I’ve tried.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't keep hair dry
customer_reviews.text: I've tried everything and this cap doesn't keep my hair dry. I guess I'll keep it and try again, but I don't think it's going to work. Water seeps in around the ears.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa C.

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Hope it will not tear with continued use. Material seems to be a little thin. So far so good. First one received had a tear in it. Retured and replacement was good.
customer_reviews.author: Fran Adams

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: I used this cap for my granddaughter who is 6 years old for swimming lessons it keeps her hair dry and cover her ears. I would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: tluv2dream

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Super comfort for long hair! You have to put it on properly in order to prevent water got into your ears! But it works!
customer_reviews.author: fahitachine

customer_reviews.title: my hair loves it
customer_reviews.text: a great roomy swim cap. Only problem was it was so tight the first few times I wore it, that it caused a headache. It's better now.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Hendricks

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and better than nothing.
customer_reviews.text: So far it is working well. Water still seeps in at the back of my neck and at my ears, but much less than other caps I have tried. I recommend wetting your hair with plain water before applying.
customer_reviews.author: Xenophile

customer_reviews.title: Sweet swimcap!
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed this swim cap. I am an avid swimmer and have been looking to invest in a comfortable and affordable swim cap that works for me. This was one of those products. It was easy to get on my head and when I dipped in the pool it remained comfortable. I think that the nose is a little tight, but I am new to swimming with gear on, and I might adapt
customer_reviews.author: Brian Halbach

customer_reviews.title: Worked snorkeling
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use snorkeling in HI. It took some adjusting but kept my long curly hair mostly dry. It was a good purchase for me
customer_reviews.author: Mary Lou Ender

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed I didn’t even get to wear it. I went to put it on and this is what happened. I feel I wasted my money extremely unhappy
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and easy
customer_reviews.text: I have hair down to my middle back and this is so easy to use and keep it protected I have had no leaks and I find it very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Camilla S. Hartman

customer_reviews.title: The BEST swim cap ever!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously, I love the design and fit of this swim cap! I looked at several others and this one has many better features.
customer_reviews.author: Scuba Paws

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Love how its bigger for my curly hair UPDATE: nevermind after two days of use it starts to roll up from the back its so annoying and water gets in.
customer_reviews.author: Melly

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised about the quality of this product. Used a few times already, my hair keeps dry after swimming. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Joel Pesoa Irigoyen

customer_reviews.title: Fits Great!
customer_reviews.text: I have had a hard time finding a cap that would fit comfortably and not slide off. I've finally found it! And I love the fact that it covers my ears.
customer_reviews.author: Denise D. Simon

customer_reviews.title: No more water in my ears!
customer_reviews.text: This cap, as far as swim caps go, is almost elegant :) It has enough room for all of my hair and there are these little extra space areas for your ears so that your ears don't feel squished and yet they are fully covered and water no longer can get inside. In excellent plus in my book. I got the green color and it is very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Beach Girl

product_meta.title: Swim Cap for Long Hair - Silicone Swimcap for Long Hair | Swimming Caps for Women & Men | Silicone Swim Caps for Long Hair - Bathing Cap to Keep Your Hair Dry
feature_bullets: OFFER - No more water in your nose thanks to the included Nose Clip. Swim Elite's uniquely designed Swimming Caps along with the Nose Clip are bonding into a perfect training set that flatters your training, offering you the perfect circumstances to evolve to expert level.

LOOK GOOD - Our Swim Cap it's ergonomically designed and easy to put on without snagging your hair. These Swim Caps for Long Hair won’t cause any breakage and won’t wrinkle. Made with a precision fit for reduced drag and tear resistance.

FEEL GOOD - Besides being lighweight and durable, its elastic properties allow the cap to fit sizes varying from S to XL, whether your hair is long or short! These Swimming Caps for Women can also be used by Men and are created to protects your ears and hair from bacteria, chloride and other substances in the water.

SWIM GOOD - Swim Elite’s Long Hair Swimming Cap is odorless and allergy-free. Providing comfort and efficiency, our cap protects your hair and scalp. It helps you focus on performance, since you will no longer face the same old struggles.

ALWAYS BE ENTIRELY SATISFIED - Your experience with the products is our guidline. Our Swim Caps for Women and Men are tested by professional swimmers and instructors, but if they don’t get your seal of approval, we’ll do our best to fix the situation as soon as possible.
